Text.Language: I/couc Pi,~rictoc n~caf nem voou: n~yof n~yof pe nem sa e~neh: qen ouhupoctacic n~ouwt: tenouwst m~mof ten]w~ou naf.
Jesus Christ is the same yesterday, today and forever, in one hypostasis, we worship Him and glorify Him.
يسوع المسيح هو هو أمساً واليوم وإلى الأبد اقنوم واحد نسجد له ونمجده.
